title: Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu - Count, Letters & Link (3in1) | Math, Words, Magnetic Blocks, Puzzles | 4-10 Years STEM Toys | Gift Boys & Girls (Works with iPads, iPhones, Samsung tabs, Kindle Fire)
descriptions:
### Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu

**Product Overview:**
Experience the future of interactive STEM learning with the Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu, designed to engage children aged 4-10 in a dynamic blend of education and fun. This innovative product combines advanced augmented reality (AR) technology with magnetic blocks to create a comprehensive learning experience that fosters a wide range of skills including math, vocabulary, puzzle-solving, problem-solving, and fine-motor skills.

---

**Product Details:**

- **Components:**
  - **Plugo Count:** A magnetic block kit focused on teaching counting and arithmetic.
  - **Plugo Letters:** A magnetic block kit designed to enhance spelling and vocabulary skills.
  - **Plugo Link:** A magnetic block kit that introduces children to puzzles and problem-solving.

- **Educational Focus:**
  - **Math:** Enhance understanding of numbers and arithmetic.
  - **Vocabulary:** Improve spelling and linguistic abilities.
  - **Puzzles:** Develop problem-solving skills.
  - **Problem-Solving:** Encourage critical thinking and logical reasoning.
  - **Fine-Motor Skills:** Improve dexterity and hand-eye coordination.

- **Age Range:**
  - Suitable for children aged **4-10 Years**.

- **Compatibility:**
  - **iOS:**
    - Compatible with **iPhone 6 & above** and **iPad 5th Gen & above**.
    - **Exceptions:** iPad Mini 1 and iPad Pro 12.9”.
  - **Android:**
    - Requires an **OS version 8 & above** and **2GB RAM & above**.
    - Front camera must be at the top centre.
    - Screens larger than 10 inches are not supported.
  - **Amazon Fire:**
    - Supported models include **7 - 2022**, **8 - 2018 & 2020**, and **8+ - 2020**.

- **App Availability:**
  - Download the **Plugo** app from the **App Store** and **Play Store** for free.
  - **Features:**
    - **15 Interactive Games** to keep learning fun.
    - **750+ Levels** to ensure educational progression.
    - **Adaptive Learning:** Suitable for **pre-K to Grade 4**.

- **Box Contents:**
  - **3 Plugo Kits:** Count, Letters, and Link.
  - **1 Plugo Gamepad:** Foldable mat with embedded magnets.

- **Gift Suitability:**
  - Perfect for **Boys and Girls**.

- **Learning Outcome:**
  - Develops counting, arithmetic, linguistic, comprehension, problem-solving, and fine-motor skills.

- **STEM Focus:**
  - Emphasizes **Math, Engineering, and Linguistic Abilities**.

---

**How It Works:**
The Plugo STEM Pack combines physical magnetic blocks with an interactive AR app to create an immersive and educational experience. Children can build and learn while the app provides real-time feedback, making learning both fun and effective.

---

**Why Choose Plugo STEM Pack?**
- **Comprehensive Learning:** Covers multiple STEM and literacy skills.
- **Interactive and Engaging:** With 15 games and 750+ levels, learning is never boring.
- **Adaptive Learning:** Tailored to the child’s pace and knowledge level.
- **Free to Use:** No in-app purchases, promoting a healthy learning environment.

---

**Get Started Today!**
Explore the world of STEM with the Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu and help your child develop essential skills for the future. Compatible with a wide range of devices, this pack is perfect for home, school, or playtime.
